text:
OpenSSL 1.0.1i has been released on 06-Aug-2014 and contains security fixes.

Security advisory:
http://www.openssl.org/news/secadv_20140806.txt
creator: knst.kolinko@gmail.com
knst.kolinko@gmail.com
text:
OpenSSL 1.0.1j was released on 15-Oct-2014.

Security advisory:
http://www.openssl.org/news/secadv_20141015.txt

creator: pbevara@gmail.com
text: Is there a simple way to build the DLL for Windows (32-bit and 64-bit)? I have seen the comments for building this in the bug ID 56596, but there doesn't seem to be a conclusive way of doing this.  If anyone has built the DLLs using the latest openssl versions, can they post them here? Thanks!

(In reply to Prasad from comment #2)
> Is there a simple way to build the DLL for Windows (32-bit and 64-bit)? I
> have seen the comments for building this in the bug ID 56596, but there
> doesn't seem to be a conclusive way of doing this.

Instructions are on the Wiki. That is how official Tomcat Native 1.1.31 release was built.
http://wiki.apache.org/tomcat/BuildTcNativeWin
creator: knst.kolinko@gmail.com

text: Tomcat Native 1.1.32 release uses OpenSSL 1.0.1j. This issue is thereby fixed.
creator: knst.kolinko@gmail.com
